wikipedia_page.main: Oliver Jonathan Turvey (born 1 April 1987) is a British professional racing driver currently competing in Formula E. He was a notable kart racer, with two national titles, and was the 2006 McLaren Autosport BRDC Award winner. His career has been supported by the Racing Steps Foundation. He is currently signed to McLaren as a test driver.

response: *Oliver Turvey (born 1987), racing driver, attended Queen Elizabeth Grammar School and lives locally.
